oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: He Does Something About His Convictions!
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Profile of Myles Horton from The Message Magazine by Sara Sprott Morrow. The article highlights Horton's background and upbringing and focuses more on Highlander's work on labor organizing rather than Civil Rights work as that was just beginning in 1953.
The Message Magazine is a non-profit publication that strives to inform the community about the practices and values of Islam. (The Message Magazine Facebook Page)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Morrow, Sara Sprott
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Labor unions and education; Investigations; Race relations; Civil rights; Labor movement; Labor leaders; United Packinghouse Workers of America; Johnson, Lilian Wyckoff, 1864-1956; Education; Rural development; Community leadership; Communities
